DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect latanoprost intraocular pressure reduction patient ocular hypertension open-angle glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Efficacy 3 Months Latanoprost Treatment Reducing Intraocular Pressure Patients With Ocular Hypertension Open-Angle Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: A patient IOP great equal 20 mmHg related unilateral bilateral OH OAG ( primary open angle glaucoma , pseudoexfoliative glaucoma , pigmentary glaucoma ) , visual field exam Naive patient ( i.e . never treat ) require treatment initiation A patient OH OAG currently treatment A patient OH OAG previously treat ( regardless date treatment discontinue ) A patient traumatic , inflammatory , neovascular glaucoma
